docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.text:
figcaption{ font-style: normal!important; font-size: small; } .md-typeset__scrollwrap{ text-align:center; } test page in this section i will test a couple of pluggings used in this website latex \begin{align*} \text{maximize}& \sum_{s\in S} \ \left[\text{min}_{a \in A \setminus a^*} (\mathbf{P}_{a^*,s} - \mathbf{P}_{a,s}) (\mathbf{I} - \gamma \mathbf{P}_{a^*})^{-1} \mathbf{R}\right] - \lambda ||\mathbf{R}||_1 \newline \text{s.t. }& (\mathbf{P}_{a^*} - \mathbf{P}_{a}) (\mathbf{I} - \gamma \mathbf{P}_{a^*})^{-1} \mathbf{R} \succeq 0, \forall a \in A \setminus a^{*} \end{align*} figure 标题不能加Latex而且是斜体 citation I want to cite this 1 table Parameter Type Description foo string A parameter that does something. bar int A parameter that does something. baz URI Required. You better use this. python """comment here""" import pandas as pd import altair as alt import sys print(sys.version) print(sys.version_info) source = pd.DataFrame({ 'a': ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H', 'I'], 'b': [28, 55, 43, 91, 81, 53, 19, 87, 52] }) alt.Chart(source).mark_bar().encode(x='a', y='b').properties( width=600, height=200 ) [1] 2020-08-09 17:01:49 ( 29.0ms ) python3 ( 757ms ) 3.8.5 (tags/v3.8.5:580fbb0, Jul 20 2020, 15:43:08) [MSC v.1926 32 bit (Intel)] sys.version_info(major=3, minor=8, micro=5, releaselevel='final', serial=0) (function(spec, embedOpt){ let outputDiv = document.currentScript.previousElementSibling; if (outputDiv.id !== "altair-viz-00f4c00d7d914f719bf091ae4efa6bb5") { outputDiv = document.getElementById("altair-viz-00f4c00d7d914f719bf091ae4efa6bb5"); } const paths = { "vega": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega@5?noext", "vega-lib": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lib?noext", "vega-lite": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lite@4.8.1?noext", "vega-embed": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-embed@6?noext", }; function loadScript(lib) { return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) { var s = document.createElement('script'); s.src = paths[lib]; s.async = true; s.onload = () => resolve(paths[lib]); s.onerror = () => reject(`Error loading script: ${paths[lib]}`); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s); }); } function showError(err) { outputDiv.innerHTML = `
${err}
`; throw err; } function displayChart(vegaEmbed) { vegaEmbed(outputDiv, spec, embedOpt) .catch(err => showError(`Javascript Error: ${err.message}
This usually means there's a typo in your chart specification. See the javascript console for the full traceback.`)); } if(typeof define === "function" && define.amd) { requirejs.config({paths}); require(["vega-embed"], displayChart, err => showError(`Error loading script: ${err.message}`)); } else if (typeof vegaEmbed === "function") { displayChart(vegaEmbed); } else { loadScript("vega") .then(() => loadScript("vega-lite")) .then(() => loadScript("vega-embed")) .catch(showError) .then(() => displayChart(vegaEmbed)); } })({"config": {"view": {"continuousWidth": 400, "continuousHeight": 300}}, "data": {"name": "data-c2a3e89ba9d5d1687d5e8c28d630a033"}, "mark": "bar", "encoding": {"x": {"type": "nominal", "field": "a"}, "y": {"type": "quantitative", "field": "b"}}, "height": 200, "width": 600, "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v4.8.1.json", "datasets": {"data-c2a3e89ba9d5d1687d5e8c28d630a033": [{"a": "A", "b": 28}, {"a": "B", "b": 55}, {"a": "C", "b": 43}, {"a": "D", "b": 91}, {"a": "E", "b": 81}, {"a": "F", "b": 53}, {"a": "G", "b": 19}, {"a": "H", "b": 87}, {"a": "I", "b": 52}]}}, {"mode": "vega-lite"}); reference First Author and Second Author. Test title. Testing Journal , 2019. ↩
